def_cn: （用于镇痛或安眠的）鸦片制剂
def_en: An opiate is a drug that contains opium. Opiates are used to reduce pain or to help people to sleep.

def_cn: （使人忽视重要事情的）麻醉品，慰藉物
def_en: If you call something an opiate, you disapprove of it because it makes people think less or spend less time on important activities.
